awards.text: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 2 nominations.

fullplot: Boston is being terrorized by a series of seemingly random murders of women. Based on the true story, the film follows the investigators path through several leads before introducing the Strangler as a character. It is seen almost exclusively from the point of view of the investigators who have very few clues to build a case upon.
plot: A series of brutal murders in Boston sparks a seemingly endless and increasingly complex manhunt.
title: The Boston Strangler
